MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH42 postcode area of Dunbar, affecting properties in Daniels Brae and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.12am. Our engineers are on site carrying out line patrols to locate and repair the fault. Our team are expecting to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:08am on the 26th of October 2020.
